post.body: sideways? i guess i can't complain about our measly rain over here
CRAP - I never did before, until one of the monsters noticed it. So guess what I started doing...
where are you again? i'm in cali
i bet! i wish we could go out for a drink. or TWO or THREE! ;)
LOL! But it makes you wonder how the fools get a hold of all the cards they steal...
ooh girl - I am feelin' for ya... it just gets more and more complicated, doesn't it?
ahhh - the split schedule is tough, isn't it? mine gets picked up on xmas day at noon *sigh*
LOL - only if I get to have a glass of wine with it - though that would probably lower my number, huh?
oh hell - NINE years?! can't top that - mine was last month
props out to BofA! I hope you won't be responsible for what the idiots charged - how much damage did they do?
LOL - girl - I think I'm right behind you at the 7th. And to think I'm STILL not done shopping yet. I am SO asking for it.
oh hell - you're ahead of me. I haven't even STARTED :(
tell me about it - they can keep their low prices and that smiley face - the hell you have to deal with is SO not worth it
ooh girl - today is my wrapping day. last chance I have to wrap before midnight coz it's the last day of school
OMG - I hear ya about Wal-Mart. Can't stand it!
Shut. Up. :( I'm sorry you have to deal with that...!
lol - i'll be sure to save some!! we should hook up again after the holidays!
central, actually - even closer! :) moved here about 2 1/2 years ago from Dago
really? norcal? i have meetings up there sometimes - i'll have to look you up the next time!
It's time. Gonna sneak off to start wrapping presents. With friggin' different wrapping and tags for St. Nick so I don't get busted. Again.
Paying the bills... oh joy
